g.text: Coevolution with angiosperms - flowers provide nectar,
TILES: Occupy BOTH land AND aquatic (unique)
SURVIVAL: SAFE all extinctions except ice.
Crocodilians are 'living fossils' - body plan unchanged
Can displace any organism on Swamp/Freshwa...
Crocodilians spin rapidly to dismember large prey - uni
Venom evolved independently 100+ times - scorpions had
Tree-dwelling requires grasping limbs and enhanced spat
Opposable thumbs enable precision grip - key to primate
Brain tissue uses 20x more energy than muscle - expensi
Many offspring, little parental care - thrives in unsta
